name: Gnomington
description: In a world were monsters walk the platform, and you've only got your wits and alien poison to kill all that nast bad guys. some one left "herbs" all over and if you collect enough you can get stuff from the shop to help kick butt! now get out there boys and girls and save that princes! oh yah theres a princes and every level has a hidden key that unlocks the next level... um but you'll figure all that out your a smart one good luck and have fun!
